023package org.opt4j.core.config;
024
025import java.awt.Component;
026import java.awt.Graphics;
027import java.awt.Image;
028import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
029import java.net.URL;
030
031import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
032
033/**
034 * The {@link Icons} class is used to get {@link ImageIcon}s from a given
035 * {@code filename}. Moreover, it contains the {@code filenames} of some
036 * standard icons.
037 * 
038 * @author glass
039 * 
040 */
041public class Icons {
042
043        /**
044         * The icon for the xml.
045         */
046        public static final String XMLTAG = "icons/xmltag.png";
047
048        /**
049         * The icon for the xml.
050         */
051        public static final String XML = "icons/xml.png";
052
053        /**
054         * The icon for the optimizer.
055         */
056        public static final String OPTIMIZER = "icons/tools-blue.png";
057
058        /**
059         * The icon for the problem.
060         */
061        public static final String PROBLEM = "icons/gear-gray.png";
062
063        /**
064         * The icon for the archive.
065         */
066        public static final String ARCHIVE = "icons/user-green.png";
067
068        /**
069         * The icon for the population.
070         */
071        public static final String POPULATION = "icons/user-blue.png";
072
073        /**
074         * The icon for the pareto contentPanel.
075         */
076        public static final String PARETO = "icons/stat.png";
077
078        /**
079         * The icon for the convergence plot.
080         */
081        public static final String CONVERGENCE = "icons/convergence.png";
082
083        /**
084         * The icon for the play button.
085         */
086        public static final String PLAY = "icons/play.png";
087
088        /**
089         * The icon for the operator.
090         */
091        public static final String OPERATOR = "icons/tools-orange.png";
092
093        /**
094         * The icon for the application.
095         */
096        public static final String APPLICATION = "icons/appl.png";
097
098        /**
099         * The icon for the green puzzle.
100         */
101        public static final String PUZZLE_GREEN = "icons/puzzle-green.png";
102
103        /**
104         * The icon for the blue puzzle.
105         */
106        public static final String PUZZLE_BLUE = "icons/puzzle-blue.png";
107
108        /**
109         * The icon for the selector.
110         */
111        public static final String SELECTOR = "icons/tools-orange.png";
112
113        /**
114         * The icon for the tutorial.
115         */
116        public static final String HELP = "icons/help.png";
117
118        /**
119         * The icon for the control start.
120         */
121        public static final String CONTROL_START = "icons/control_start.png";
122
123        /**
124         * The icon for the control stop.
125         */
126        public static final String CONTROL_STOP = "icons/control_stop.png";
127
128        /**
129         * The icon for the control pause.
130         */
131        public static final String CONTROL_PAUSE = "icons/control_pause.png";
132
133        /**
134         * The icon for the control term.
135         */
136        public static final String CONTROL_TERM = "icons/control_term.png";
137
138        /**
139         * The icon for the control term.
140         */
141        public static final String FOLDER = "icons/folder.png";
142
143        /**
144         * The icon for the control term.
145         */
146        public static final String FOLDER_ADD = "icons/folder_add.png";
147
148        /**
149         * The icon for the control term.
150         */
151        public static final String SFOLDER = "icons/small_folder.png";
152
153        /**
154         * A disk.
155         */
156        public static final String DISK = "icons/disk.png";
157
158        /**
159         * A console.
160         */
161        public static final String CONSOLE = "icons/console.png";
162
163        /**
164         * The Opt4J logo.
165         */
166        public static final String OPT4J = "icons/logo2.png";
167
168        /**
169         * An add bullet.
170         */
171        public static final String ADD = "icons/add.png";
172
173        /**
174         * A delete bullet.
175         */
176        public static final String DELETE = "icons/delete.png";
177
178        /**
179         * A delete bullet.
180         */
181        public static final String LOADING = "icons/loading.gif";
182
183        /**
184         * A text sheet.
185         */
186        public static final String TEXT = "icons/text.png";
187
188        /**
189         * Returns the {@link URL} of a file.
190         * 
191         * @param filename
192         *            the filename
193         * @return the url
194         */
195        public static URL getURL(String filename) {
196                ClassLoader classLoader = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader();
197                URL url = classLoader.getResource(filename);
198                return url;
199        }
200
201        /**
202         * Returns an {@link ImageIcon} from a filename.
203         * 
204         * @param filename
205         *            the filename
206         * @return the corresponding image icon
207         */
208        public static ImageIcon getIcon(String filename) {
209                URL url = getURL(filename);
210                try {
211                        return new ImageIcon(url);
212                } catch (NullPointerException e) {
213                        System.err.println("Image " + filename + " not found.");
214                        e.printStackTrace();
215                        return null;
216                }
217        }
218
219        /**
220         * Returns a transparent 16x16px {@link ImageIcon}.
221         * 
222         * @return a transparent 16x16px {@link ImageIcon}
223         */
224        public static ImageIcon getDefault() {
225                Image image = new BufferedImage(16, 16, BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_ARGB);
226                ImageIcon icon = new ImageIcon(image);
227
228                return icon;
229        }
230
231        /**
232         * This methods merges multiple {@link ImageIcon}s into a single
233         * {@link ImageIcon}.
234         * 
235         * @param icons
236         *            the icons to merge
237         * @return the merged icons
238         */
239        public static ImageIcon merge(ImageIcon... icons) {
240
241                /**
242                 * The {@link MergedIcon} merges two icons into one.
243                 * 
244                 * @author lukasiewycz
245                 * 
246                 */
247                @SuppressWarnings("serial")
248                class MergedIcon extends ImageIcon {
249
250                        private final ImageIcon[] icons;
251
252                        public MergedIcon(ImageIcon[] icons) {
253                                super();
254                                this.icons = icons;
255                        }
256
257                        @Override
258                        public void paintIcon(Component c, Graphics g, int x, int y) {
259                                for (ImageIcon icon : icons) {
260                                        icon.paintIcon(c, g, x, y);
261                                }
262                        }
263
264                        @Override
265                        public int getIconWidth() {
266                                return icons[0].getIconWidth();
267                        }
268
269                        @Override
270                        public int getIconHeight() {
271                                return icons[0].getIconHeight();
272                        }
273                }
274
275                return new MergedIcon(icons);
276        }
277}
